00006 import newtonERP.viewers.viewerData.BaseViewerData;
00007 
00013 public class BaseViewer
00014 {
00015 
00021         public static String getTopHtmlCode(BaseViewerData entity)
00022         {
00023                 String html = "";
00024                 if (entity.getBackLink() != null)
00025                 {
00026                         html += "<p class='backLink'>";
00027                         html += LinkViewer.getHtmlCode(entity.getBackLink());
00028                         html += "</p>";
00029                 }
00030 
00031                 html += "<h2>" + entity.getTitle() + "</h2>";
00032 
00033                 html += getMessage(entity);
00034 
00035                 return html;
00036         }
00037 
00043         private static String getMessage(BaseViewerData entity)
00044         {
00045                 String html = "";
00046                 if (entity.getAlertMessageList() != null)
00047                         for (String message : entity.getAlertMessageList())
00048                                 html += "<p class='errorMessage'>" + message + "</p>";
00049 
00050                 if (entity.getNormalMessageList() != null)
00051                         for (String message : entity.getNormalMessageList())
00052                                 html += "<p class='normalMessage'>" + message + "</p>";
00053                 return html;
00054         }
00055 
00061         public static String getBottomHtmlCode(BaseViewerData entity)
00062 
00063         {
00064                 String html = "";
00065                 html += "<p>";
00066                 for (ActionLink globalAction : entity.getGlobalActions())
00067                 {
00068                         html += ButtonLinkViewer.getHtmlCode(globalAction);
00069                         /*
00070                          * todo: remove when sucefully tested html += " <a href='" +
00071                          * globalAction.getUrl() + "'>"; html += globalAction.getName() +
00072                          * "</a> ";
00073                          */
00074                 }
00075                 html += getPrintButton(); // todo: find a way to get this out of here...
00076                 html += "</p>";
00077 
00078                 return html;
00079         }
00080 
00081         private static String getPrintButton()
00082         {
00083                 return "<ins><form class='submitButton' action='.\\'><div><input class='submitButton' type='submit' value='Imprimer' onclick='window.print();return false;'/></div></form></ins>";
00084         }
00085 }
